title: Can I still take action against police misconduct that happened in 2010?
question: I have PTSD because of an assault by Santa Ana police officers in 2010 also I still have a $4,000 medical debt because of that situation
answers: It is unclear why you waited so long to inquire....I am not a local CA lawyer....but contact one.. I wish you the best of luck.

Personal injury attorneys give free consults, so call some offices.

I'm not in CA, but most states are not going to have a statute of limitations this long. There is a good chance you don't have a viable action. However, only an attorney in CA can tell you that.
